display.title: Roasty
description: A &&3Smoker&&r is a specialized furnace variant that &&dcooks food at double speed&&r.
All Furnaces accept many types of fuel.
&&3Smaller fuels&&r are less wasteful when processing smaller numbers of items.
&&eLarge fuels&&r are &&3only efficient for large loads&&r - with &&eLava Buckets&&r smelting &&d100 items&&r.
&&7[Farmer's Delight]&&r A &&eStove&&r can be used to provide a heart source similar to a &&3Campfire&&r.
Like campfires, it can be used with a &&3Cooking Pot&&r or a &&3Skillet&&r.
A &&3Cooking Pot&&r can cook &&dmany bowls of hearty meals&&r - and can be picked up with them in it!

A &&3Skillet&&r can be used to &&dcook food in the off-hand&&r when neaby to heat sources. It can also be placed on one with &&7[&&r&&6Sneak+Right-Click&&r&&7]&&r, where it can cook a &&dwhole stack of food&&r. In a pinch, it also &&dworks as a weapon&&r.
